( https://community.make.com/t/releases-on-make-february-2025/74616?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+3%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )New This Month: AI content generation, chatbots, and more

 

Check out last month's releases! Google Vertex for AI content generation, 360Messenger for WhatsApp to power automated messaging and chatbots, CodeQR, tips for handling incomplete executions, and more!

See what's new ➜ ( https://community.make.com/t/releases-on-make-february-2025/74616?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+3%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )

 

( https://www.make.com/en/waves-25?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+3%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )Waves is back!

 

Join us in Munich on October 16 for Waves '25 – this year, we're going bigger than ever! Check out what's planned, get ready for tickets, and sign up for exciting updates. 

Explore Waves '25 ➜ ( https://www.make.com/en/waves-25?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+3%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )

( https://community.make.com/t/make-academy-introduction-to-ai-course/74300?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+3%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )
Master AI with Make Academy

 

Take our newest "Introduction to AI" Academy course! In just 2 hours, you'll learn how to build powerful real-world scenarios that harness LLMs and generative AI in Make. 

Enroll for free ➜ ( https://community.make.com/t/make-academy-introduction-to-ai-course/74300?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+3%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )

( https://www.make.com/en/ai-automation?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+3%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )Revolutionize your work with AI

 

Discover what's possible with AI and Make. Over 200 AI tools like OpenAI and Google Vertex AI let you automate decisions, process data, generate insights, create content, and manage requests effortlessly. 

Automate with AI ➜ ( https://www.make.com/en/ai-automation?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+3%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )

( https://www.make.com/en/success-stories/datatoolbox-uses-make-save-hundreds-hours?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+3%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )
Customer story: Cut costs by 90%

 

By automating data integration, reporting, and campaign optimization with Make, Datatoolbox saved hundreds of hours and slashed costs by 90%. Clients now get quicker results, with no manual work involved. Want the full story?

Learn how ➜ ( https://www.make.com/en/success-stories/datatoolbox-uses-make-save-hundreds-hours?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+3%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )
